entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.4°C

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
